#
# Description of directory and file names in project OGRE
#
FLOW_DIR = <RAW_DIR>/<STATION>/Flowdata
FLOW_CSV = <FLOW_DIR>/<FLOW_SUBDIR_CURRENT>/<STATION>XXXXX.TXT

SAMPLE_DIR = <RAW_DIR>/<STATION>/Sampledata
SAMPLE_CSV_PATTERN = ^sample_log_\d{8}\.csv$

RAIN_DIR = <RAW_DIR>/../VAL/REGEN
RAIN_XLS_PATTERN = ^Regenschreiberdaten-201[3-5]-Q[1-4]_OGRE_integrierte_Validierung
RAIN_XLS_TABLE = Niederschlag$

OUTPUT_DIR = <RAW_DIR>/../../_DatenAnalyse/Automatic/<STATION>
OUTPUT_DIR_OVERVIEW = <OUTPUT_DIR>/OverviewPlots
OUTPUT_DIR_EVENTS = <OUTPUT_DIR>/SampledEvents
OUTPUT_DIR_DATA = <OUTPUT_DIR>/Data

HYDRAULIC_DATA_RAW = <OUTPUT_DIR_DATA>/tmp_hydraulic_raw.csv
HYDRAULIC_DATA_VAL = <OUTPUT_DIR_DATA>/tmp_hydraulic_val.csv
HYDRAULIC_EVENTS = <OUTPUT_DIR_DATA>/tmp_hydraulic_events.csv
HYDRAULIC_AND_RAIN_EVENTS = <OUTPUT_DIR_DATA>/tmp_hydraulic_and_rain_events.csv

SAMPLING_EVENTS = <OUTPUT_DIR_DATA>/tmp_sampling_events.csv
BOTTLE_EVENTS = <OUTPUT_DIR_DATA>/tmp_bottle_events.csv
SAMPLER_EVENTS = <OUTPUT_DIR_DATA>/tmp_sampler_events.csv

OVERVIEW_HQ_DATA_PDF = <OUTPUT_DIR_OVERVIEW>/tmp_<STATION>_<HYDRAULIC_END>_since_<HYDRAULIC_BEGIN>_HQ_data.pdf
OVERVIEW_EVENTS_PDF  = <OUTPUT_DIR_OVERVIEW>/tmp_<STATION>_<HYDRAULIC_END>_since_<HYDRAULIC_BEGIN>_H_events.pdf

SAMPLED_EVENT_PREFIX = <OUTPUT_DIR_EVENTS>/<SAMPLED_EVENT_NAME>/tmp_<STATION>_<SAMPLED_EVENT_NAME>

SAMPLED_EVENT_CSV_SAMPLES = <SAMPLED_EVENT_PREFIX>_samples.csv
SAMPLED_EVENT_CSV_BOTTLES = <SAMPLED_EVENT_PREFIX>_bottles.csv
SAMPLED_EVENT_CSV_HYDRAULICS = <SAMPLED_EVENT_PREFIX>_hydraulics.csv
SAMPLED_EVENT_CSV_COMPOSITE = <SAMPLED_EVENT_PREFIX>_composite.csv
SAMPLED_EVENT_PDF_COMPOSITE = <SAMPLED_EVENT_PREFIX>_composite.pdf

REGRESSION_DIR = <OUTPUT_DIR>/RegressionModel
REGRESSION_COEFF_TXT = <REGRESSION_DIR>/tmp_<STATION>_coefficients.txt
REGRESSION_MODEL_TXT = <REGRESSION_DIR>/tmp_<STATION>_regressionModel.txt
